mapping.sql: SELECT ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_DESC, CREATED_USER, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_USER, MODIFIED_DATE FROM OCT_ACCOUNT where 1=1 {and ACCOUNT_CODE like '%'||#accountCode#||'%'} {and ACCOUNT_NAME like '%'||#accountName#||'%'}
UPDATE OCT_ACCOUNT SET ACCOUNT_NAME=#account_name_upd#, ACCOUNT_DESC=#account_desc_upd#, MODIFIED_USER=#session.USER_ID#, MODIFIED_DATE=#date()# WHERE ACCOUNT_CODE=#account_code_old#
delete from E_USER_ACCOUNT where ACCOUNT_CODE=#account_code#; delete from OCT_ACCOUNT where ACCOUNT_CODE=#account_code#;

select t1.USER_ID, t1.LOGIN_ID, t1.USER_NAME from E_USER t1 where 1=1 {and t1.LOGIN_ID like '%'||#loginid#||'%'} {and t1.USER_NAME like '%'||#username#||'%'} and t1.user_id not in(select user_id from E_USER_ACCOUNT where ACCOUNT_CODE=#account_code#) order by t1.reg_date desc
delete from E_USER_ACCOUNT where account_code = #account_code# and user_id=#userId#
